description:
Spacious true 1 bedroom apartment with a large patio in a mid-rise building. Separate dining area and a good-sized kitchen for cooking. We get great natural light, and have tons of lamps for when the sun goes down. We are walking distance to Central Park and Museum Mile. 

Our dog Cosmo is pictured in a few of our pictures. If you're interested in sitting him during your stay, let us know! Otherwise, he will not be around during your stay.

Private Patio with grill
Laundry on same floor
Gym on same floor
Courtyard on same floor
name: Spacious 1-Bedroom Apt with Large Patio
review: La comunicación con Morgan fue muy fluida y toda la información que nos envió fue clara y  útil. Nos encontramos a gusto en el alojamiento. El autobús está muy próximo y El barrio era tranquilo.
